titleStmt.title: Roome for a gentleman, or The second part of faultes collected and gathered for the true meridian of Dublin in Ireland, and may serue fitly else where about London, and in many other partes of England. By Barnabe Rych souldier.
titleStmt.author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] W[indet] for Ieffrey Chorlton, and are to be sold at his shoppe at the great north dore of Paules Church,

notesStmt.note: The word "faultes" in the title is xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his shoppe at the great north dore of Paules Church
